events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system classified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message content.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I'll do my best to help you process a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 45892137. I have attached a photo showing the item doesn't match what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund for you and arrange a free return shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response! I really appreciate the free shipping label and refund offer.
I've finalized the refund process and sent you the return label via email. Expect the refund in 5-7 business days.
We’re checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you’re satisfied with the resolution provided.
As we received no further issues, we are closing your case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
